IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDING DIRECT AND INDIRECT FUNDING FOR SCHOLARSHIPS, FACILITIES, SALARY SUPPLEMENTS, AND OTHER SUPPORT FOR THE UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI DEPARTMENT OF INTERCOLLEGIATE ATHLETICS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDING DIRECT AND INDIRECT FUNDING FOR SCHOLARSHIPS, FACILITIES, SALARY SUPPLEMENTS, AND OTHER SUPPORT FOR THE UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI DEPARTMENT OF INTERCOLLEGIATE ATHLETICS.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDED FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO THE UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI FOR MAJOR FACILITIES CONSTRUCTION AND IMPROVEMENTS ON THE CAMPUS DURING THIS FISCAL YEAR. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO PROVIDED SIGNIFICANT SALARY SUPPLEMENTS TO UNIVERSITY STAFF MEMBERS AND BOTH DIRECTLY AND INDIRECTLY SUPPORTED THE UNIVERSITY WITH FUNDING FOR SCHOLARSHIPS AND OTHER SUPPORT FOR THE UNIVERSITY'S ATHLETIC PROGRAMS AND SCHOLAR ATHLETES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO SUPPORT FOOTBALL, BASKETBALL, AND WOMEN'S OPERATIONS, AND SCHOLARSHIPS

THE FOUNDATION HAD NO SIGNIFICANT UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AT JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022, RESPECTIVELY. IF INTEREST AND PENALTIES ARE INCURRED RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS, SUCH AMOUNTS ARE RECOGNIZED AS INCOME TAX EXPENSE IN THE STATEMENT OF CHANGES IN NET ASSETS AVAILABLE FOR BENEFITS. AS OF JUNE 30, 2023, TAX PERIODS FOR TAX YEARS 2022, 2021, AND 2020 REMAIN OPEN TO EXAMINATION BY THE FEDERAL AND STATE TAXING JURISDICTIONS TO WHICH THE FOUNDATION IS SUBJECT.
THE COACHES' INCENTIVE COMPENSATION CONTRACTS ARE BASED ON TEAM ACCOMPLISHMENTS. SEVERANCE PAYMENTS TO FORMER COACHES ARE BASED ON CONTRACTS.

COMPENSATION FROM RELATED ORGANIZATIONS: WENDELL WEAKLEY - UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI FOUNDATION ALL OTHER OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, COACHES AND FORMER COACHES WITH RELATED ORG COMPENSATION WERE PAID BY UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI.
A BROKERAGE FIRM PROCESSES AND SELLS STOCK GIFTS AND A REAL ESTATE FIRM SELLS REAL PROPERTY GIFTS, IF ANY.

THE ORGANIZATION MADE PAYMENTS TO EMPLOYEES DURING THE YEAR THAT ARE SUBJECT TO SECTION 4960 WHICH IMPOSES AN EXCISE TAX ON THE AMOUNT OF REMUNERATION IN EXCESS OF $1 MILLION PAID BY AN APPLICABLE TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION TO A COVERED EMPLOYEE. PER NOTICE 2019-09, THE UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI FEIN #64-6001159 AS THE COMMON-LAW EMPLOYER FOR THE COVERED EMPLOYEES HAS REPORTED THE EXCESS COMPENSATION ON FORM 4720 AND PAID THE EXCISE TAX DUE.

FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS ELECT THE BOARD OF GOVERNORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND THE BOARD FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DISCLOSURES ARE REQUIRED TO BE UPDATED ANNUALLY WITH STATEMENTS THAT ASSURE NO CONFLICTS OF INTEREST OR FULL DESCRIPTIONS OF ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CEO/CFO'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE ATHLETICS DIRECTOR AND THE BOARD OF GOVERNORS. OTHER EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE CFO/CEO AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND FORMS 990 ARE AVAILABLE ONLINE AND OTHER GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION AT THE ORGANIZATION'S OFFICE.
